charges.charge_description: 18:1708 LARCENY &; THEFT, POSTAL theft and possession of stolen mail (1)

charges.charge_disposition: AMENDED JUDGMENT IN A CRIMINAL CASE (FOR REVOCATION OF PROBATION OR SUPERVISED RELEASE) The defendant admitted guilt to violation of conditions 1, 2 and 3 of the term of supervision. Imprisonment: Three (3) Months. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:1708 LARCENY &; THEFT, POSTAL theft and possession of stolen mail (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment one (1) month on ct. 1. The deft. shall surrender to the United States marshal for this district at 10am on 1-4-93. Upon release from imprisonment, the deft. shall be on supervised release for a term of three (3) years on count 1. The deft. shall not possess a firearm or destructive device. The standard conditions of supervised release will apply. During the period of supervised release, the deft. shall make restitution to the U.S. Post Office in the amount of $900.00 on a schedule that is fixed by the Probation Dept. The defendant is prohibited from incurring any credit charges, or opening any lines of credit, without the approval of the Probation Office. The deft. shall participate in such program as the Probation Officer directs for substance abuse, which may include testing to determine whether you have used drugs. The deft. shall pay a fine of $250.00. The fine includes any costs of incarceration and/or supervision. The court has determined that the deft. does not have the ability to pay interest. It is ordered that:the interest requirement is waived. This fine plus any interest required shall be paid:in full immediately. The deft. shall make restitution to the following persons in the following amt. $900.00 to the United States Post Office in installments as fixed by the Probation Officer. Assessment of $50.00. (1)
